title: Hiver Trial Follow Up with Orka.tv

signals.problem_statement: The customer does not see the value in the product due to the current low volume of emails requiring assignment.
signals.customer_ask: The customer wants to discuss ideas internally to leverage the tool more effectively.
signals.suggested_solution: The customer suggested that the product could be more useful when scaling and handling more emails.
signals.context: Small team managing email communications with a low volume of actionable emails.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is experiencing issues with the product not being fully utilized due to a lack of need for email assignment.
signals.customer_ask: The customer is looking for ways to improve internal processes and email management.
signals.suggested_solution: The customer mentioned wanting to sit down with the team to discuss potential improvements.
signals.context: Small team managing email communications with a low volume of actionable emails.

signals.problem_statement: The customer feels that the product's metrics are not accurate due to a high volume of automated emails.
signals.customer_ask: The customer is interested in understanding the reporting features better.
signals.suggested_solution: The customer suggested cleaning out automated emails to improve metric accuracy.
signals.context: Small team managing email communications with a mix of automated and manual emails.
